Episodes.Title: Tchaikovsky
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Elizabeth targets an old source who could tip the balance of the upcoming summit, as Philip deals with business at the travel agency. Stan learns an old friend is back in town.

Episodes.Title: Urban Transport Planning
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: In the aftermath of a disastrous operation, Philip and Elizabeth clash about how to handle things with Paige. Stan struggles to contain the growing risks of Sofia and Gennadi's fraying relationship.

Episodes.Title: Mr. and Mrs. Teacup
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: After picking up a distressing piece of intelligence, Elizabeth takes extreme measures to get close to a Soviet negotiator; Philip shares some stunning news with Henry.

Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: As the summit fast approaches, Elizabeth enlists Philip's help for a mission that could yield game-changing intel.

Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: A sudden assignment pulls Elizabeth away from her family at a crucial moment. At the FBI, a major development leads Aderholt to approach Stan about an urgent investigation.

Episodes.Title: Harvest

Episodes.Plot: Phillip goes to Chicago to help Elizabeth complete her mission; Stan's suspicions grow.
